body:
spack info kallisto 
reports that kallisto depends on mpich.

This is surprising to me because it is not optional and specific to the mpich package (and not a dependency on the virtual MPI package).  But even more surprising, is I do not see any mention of kallisto supporting MPI.  I cannot find any mention of MPI in the source code, and the only MPI dependency appears to be indirect via hdf5 built with MPI support (see e.g. 
https://github.com/pachterlab/kallisto/issues/91)
